titleStmt.title: Ioyfull newes from Hvll. Or, Sir Iohn Hothams overthrow given to the cavaleers Wherin is shewed how Sr. Iohn Hotham having received intelligence of their coming, displayed his ordnance against them, whereby was slaine threescore cavaleers beside others who were wounded and fled. Likewise, a most remarkable passage, shewing Gods iudgment on divers cavaleers of New-Castle- Iohn Brown, Cler. Parl.

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 3 reads: The ivdgment of God on divers cavaleers for their damnable oaths.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
